data.title: Luis Cruz - Men's Track & Field
data.meta_description: Luis CruzDistance  - 2011-12: Placed eighth in the mile at the GBTC Invitational  (1/22) ... Earned third-place finishes in the 800 meter and the 4x400
data.text:
2011-12: Placed eighth in the mile at the GBTC Invitational (1/22) ... Earned third-place finishes in the 800 meter and the 4x400 relay at the Tufts Stampede (2/4) ... Notched a 12th-place finish in the 1500 meter at the Bridgewater State Invitational (3/24) ... Finished in second in the 4x400 relay at the Snowflake Invitational (4/2) ... Helped relay team win the 4x400 race at the Springfield Invitational (4/21) ... Placed 16th in the New England Outdoor Championship in the 4x400 relay (5/12).

Personal/ High School – Born August 31, 1993…son of Fernando Cruz and Allagracia Parra…has one sibling, Jaylene…four year starter on Lawrence high cross country team…MVC conference race MVP as a freshman and sophomore…appointed team captain as a junior and senior…team MVP as a junior…MVC division 2 MVP award and Eagle Tribune All-Star as a senior…undeclared major at Merrimack.
